items.headline: Learn how to build, support, & lead more effective teams & create a culture of teamwork within your organization
objectives_summary: The attributes of a highly successful team
How to evaluate and lead an effective team
Working with virtual teams and how they’re different

items.title: Sexual Harassment Training for Employees in the Workplace
items.headline: Learn about sexual harassment in the workplace and the ways to identify, report, and prevent it.
objectives_summary: Identify and prevent sexual harassment in the workplace
Ensure that employees are aware of their compliance responsibilities
Protect the organization's reputation

items.title: Communication Skills: Personality and Behaviour in Business
items.headline: The Authority Guide to Behaviour in Business: How to Inspire Others and Build Successful Relationships
objectives_summary: explain the psychology behind what really motivates and influences people.
interpret the best ways to inspire people by working effectively with their behaviour.
recognise what it is that makes people tick and why they behave they way they do.

items.title: Navigate & Respect Age, Ethnic & Racial Differences
items.headline: Diversity enriches the workplace, as long as everyone is respectful of differences. Leverage diversity on your team.
objectives_summary: Work across generations
Learn from diversity
Treat everyone with respect

objectives_summary: How to establish a high-performance and engaging culture with your virtual team.
Define the purpose of your team.
Identify the behaviours, values and expectations you share with your team.

items.title: Respect Gender & Sexual Differences & Assert Yourself
items.headline: Diversity enriches the workplace, as long as everyone is respectful. Assert yourself & leverage diversity on your team.
objectives_summary: Treat everyone with respect
Say & do the right things
Stand up for yourself & others

items.title: Introduction to Human Resource Management
items.headline: HRM is an important function of any organization. It includes managing people in a structured and thorough manner.
objectives_summary: Explain and Define What is Human Resource Management (HRM)
Explain the Scope of Human Resource Management
Describe the Processes in HRM

items.title: Understanding Personality Types at Work
items.headline: How to have a better understanding of the people you live and work with.
objectives_summary: Assess your own Personality Type and what this means in both your private and professional life
Recognise ways to appreciate, value, and work more effectively with all sixteen personality types
Discover how to build deeper relationships through common understanding and improved communication

items.title: Introduction to Human Resource Concepts
items.headline: Introduction to Human Resource Concepts
objectives_summary: Learn the job description and responsibilities of an HR assistant
Attract and retain employees in an organization
Define recruitment, selection and orientation process of new employees

objectives_summary: clearly identify and specify the skills and qualities they need a successful candidate to pocess
Structure a recruitment & selection interview for maximum impact
shortlist applications quickly and effectively, saving time and effort

items.title: HR Analytics using MS Excel for Human Resource Management
items.headline: Use Excel for HR Analytics, calculate HR metrics, build HR dashboards & ML models for Human Resource & People Analytics
objectives_summary: Use MS excel to create and automate the calculation of HR metrics
Make HR Dashboards and understand all the charts that you can draw in Excel
Become proficient in Excel data tools like Sorting, Filtering, Data validations and Data importing

items.title: Introduction to Learning and Development
items.headline: Become a confident people development practitioner and knowledgeable in Human Resource Development
objectives_summary: What Learning and Development is and how it can support the achievement of organisational objectives
Freely discuss the goal and purpose of L&D
How to identify different roles in L&D, their responsibilities and activities

items.headline: Used at Citibank®, Yelp!®, Oracle®, and other leading firms. Build your communication skills and earn your certificate!
objectives_summary: How to build trust within teams, within organizations, or as a new manager.
Verbal, group, and digital communication skills associated with performance management and giving and soliciting feedback.
Specific modalities for soliciting and giving feedback (e.g. group feedback, digital feedback, one-on-ones, coaching, and more).

items.title: Understanding and tackling Gender Bias in the workplace
items.headline: Why dismantling gender stereotypes can deliver huge benefits at both an individual and organisational level.
objectives_summary: Understand how bias and stereotypes affect our decisions, behaviour and relationships
Understand the impact of gender bias in the workplace and the business case for tackling it
Hone their ability to objectively assess people’s strengths, skills and potential

items.title: Recruiter Training - Hire Top Employees in under 30 days
items.headline: 5 Courses in 1: Proven recruiting formula to hiring top employees in a month. Used by EY, IBM, eBay & more. Free book!
objectives_summary: Become a hiring hero at your company by finding the right person in record time.
Free up your recruiting schedule so you can focus on other important areas of your job.
Free copy of my book for download, 'The Lean Recruiting Toolkit'
